website_summaries.verdict: A solid, mid-priced 2-in-1 that is upgradable.
pros: Features a 256GB hard drive, 8GB RAM, and a 3-in-1 media card reader
cons: Some customers felt this option runs very hot

customer_reviews.title: Really good!
customer_reviews.text: Good laptop/tablet indeed. I was surprised that it is even cheaper than Costco, and with the high-end screen. I am pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything was great....until a dell update crashed my Inspiron 13 less than 4 months in
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great....until a dell update crashed my Inspiron 13 less than 4 months in. The touchpad wasn’t perfect, and the battery didn’t last very long, but I had absolutely no problems and would have given it 4-5 stars, until the damn automatic dell update. Now I log in and the restart screen pops up freezing everything until it restarts and repeats the process, over and over... After reading the reviews, most seem to be within a few months of purchasing. Are these things just built to not last? Not sure if it’s an isolated problem or Dell, but it’s unacceptable regardless. Be cautious before purchasing as it’s going to be a pain trying to get repaired/replaced
customer_reviews.author: Schuyler

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Almost returned though because of the "adaptive" charging ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Almost returned though because of the "adaptive" charging not allowing it to charge past 55%. Had no idea that this was something that machines do nowadays!
customer_reviews.author: Briette Awbrey

customer_reviews.title: Best Laptop I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Don't listen to the one star reviews. This is a great laptop for serious workloads. If you are getting this as a gaming laptop, just buy a gaming laptop or a gaming PC. It drives me crazy how many people just don't know how to take care of a computer and then give it a 1 star rating when they break it. A computer is only as useless as its user.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Getting hot
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but I have to return it because it is getting too hot in the bottom. I did not see other users talk about this problem in their reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Sasa

customer_reviews.title: Windows Product Key not provided.
customer_reviews.text: The computer I purchased is supposed to come with windows 10. Once you start the computer up, it requires the windows product key to activate it. I was not provided a product key to enter. I called Beach Camera customer support and told the rep my problem, and she recommended I call Amazon. Then she told me nevermind, call the manufacturer. This is not the customer support I felt I should get. There is no reason purchasing from a third party if they cannot facilitate successful installation and startup of the product they sell. I won't buy from Beach Camera again.
customer_reviews.author: Newman

customer_reviews.title: Initial quality looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Setup was easy and have been really enjoying the significant upgrade in speed compared to my old ASUS. Touchscreen has worked well and just used the pen to ink my signature on some online forms and it worked great. Don't know about long term durability but initial quality has been awesome.
customer_reviews.author: mr+mrs.lucky

customer_reviews.title: Runs fast
customer_reviews.text: Good running product however had dead pixles on the screen when using the stylus would not pick it up sent back to try another one hope it's just a one time incident. Other than that loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: The battery has lost ability to keep a charge after 4 months of use
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this laptop on March 5th and the battery has already lost most of its ability to charge. For example, 20 minutes ago the laptop was claiming that I had 2 hrs 48 min remaining of battery life. Now, it's saying that I have 19 minutes of battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality Hardware
customer_reviews.text: Battery life deteriorated quickly and wifi stopped working completely which turned out to be internal hardware issue. Factory warranty ended within a few months of purchase as the laptop shipped to me was at the tale end of this warranty. A friend if mine works for Dell's supply chain supervision and he said Dell's parts are becoming worse and worse as the company looks for cheaper parts to have their products compete with it's Chinese competitors. Essentially a race to the bottom in quality and the people working for Dell know this. It was a great laptop when it worked. However the quality of it working lasted just months not even a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 30 plus days at the Dell Service Center
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in August 2018. In the last two months, the keyboard malfunctioned (various keys simply do not work), the laptop simply shut down and would not restart, and now again various keys are not working. Dell has "fixed" each problem without cost to me, but it takes about 10 days to two weeks between malfunction, call customer service, receiving a shipping box from Dell, and then waiting for its return from the regional service center. When it is not broken, it is fast, screen is bright and does what I need. But 30 plus days out for repairs in 9 months is unacceptable. Will not purchase a Dell again
customer_reviews.author: Rob P.

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop, weird connectivity issues
customer_reviews.text: Face recognition isn't the best, and have had weird issues with internet connectivity. Anytime I turn this laptop on, the wifi completely cuts out, and this has never happened with any other device, with there being a total of 4 laptops and 1 PC in the house with other devices. Thought it was our router or provider, but beginning to think that this is an issue with the laptop drivers with the way it came. Good laptop, but the internet issue is a massive pain
customer_reviews.author: Anne Durr

customer_reviews.title: Amazing laptop!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for a day so far, but it's amazing! Nice display, great speakers, supported by Waves Maxx audio. Also great performance, thanks to the 8gb ram and i7 processor. It will get hot, but it won't affect the computer's performance, just might cause you some discomfort. Everything is quite fast, especially the SSD. Moving over from a traditional hard drive, and it makes a HUGE difference in speed.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Smith

customer_reviews.title: Absolute favorite laptop option
customer_reviews.text: Love this laptop. It is fast, easy to use, has touchscreen capability, and can fold into a tent or tablet. It's reasonably priced new and is certainly quite durable. The screen reaches fairly close to the edges and is a great viewing size. It feels well made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan H

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a laptop equipped with the (speedy) icore 7
customer_reviews.text: Got this Dell laptop 4 months ago, to date, performed nicely and speedy. The only drawback is the casing feels a bit flimsy. Great great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SimpleJack

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dimensions, quick response, great touchscreen, my opinion is generally positive. Very happy with that purchase. The only issue is that the laptop is overheating, but only sometimes. Sure, that is not a reason to avoid buying this laptop. Having a cool temperature in the room should fix that problem, or even buy a stand or a cooler. When you take care of your things they last more. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noisy Fan and  now NOT Rebooting...it has crashed!
customer_reviews.text: Laptop is very good but the noisy fan is soooooooooooo irritating. I am going t take it in to have it checked out. And now 4 months later this laptop has crashed!!!! Seriously! Now I am looking for dell support because I cannot return it!!! Smh...
customer_reviews.author: Sherma

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! - Received i5, not i7
customer_reviews.text: I received i5 even though the website says i7. Very disappointed. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong description. Old item passed off as new!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item on Oct 30, 2018, when it was advertised as "2018 Dell Inspiron 13 5000 2-in-1 13.3 inch Full HD Touchscreen Backlit Keyboard Laptop PC, Intel Core i7-8550U Quad-Core, 8GB DDR4, 256GB SSD, 2 USB" On registering this device on Dell's website, it became obvious that an older 2017 laptop with 'almost' expired warranty was fraudulently passed off as a newer 2018 model!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mine made speakers pop and crackle
customer_reviews.text: So much on the internet forums about how this Dell makes your speakers pop. With mine. It was true. Also had a problem with saying it didn't recognize it's own power charger. Yet another thing everyone talks about on the web with this laptop. Nothing but headaches. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Lander

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The computer gets very hot. power just go off sometimes, while fully charged. The eye scanner identification tried many times before it works. Maybe my computer is defective. Just purchased 1-2 weeks brand new. Like the touch screen. Size is good, I like the computer, if it will just work well☹️. Am first time am writing a review lol.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Albert

customer_reviews.title: No longer works.
customer_reviews.text: Computer no longer works. Will not reboot. Even took it to an expert. What a waste of money. Wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia McMahan

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy But The Battery Life Isn't As Good.
customer_reviews.text: Since my purchase my laptop has seen and been through a lot, can handle daily use, travel, hours of work and/or play. I love my laptop. The only thumbs down is it's battery life. Depends on how often you utilize it, you'd be looking at buying a new battery replacement within a years time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ku`ulei

customer_reviews.title: Great performance. Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: In terms of performance, pretty good. Quick and great touchscreen. But it is LOUD. The fan runs near constant and after just a couple days I now have a loud, high pitched squealing. Great performance. Poor construction.
customer_reviews.author: Buying in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: loving my new laptop
customer_reviews.text: love it, just what i needed. I've had it for a month now and had no issues with it, the size is perfect not too big not too small and is very light easy to carry around, the screen flips which is awesome for watching movies on bed, it came with a pen but i don't use it
customer_reviews.author: Daphne R

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money/Beware of Charger
customer_reviews.text: This product was a waste of my money. The charger is so bad. It hasn't been working well and i had to borrow my brother's. The screen also freezes time to time. Now i have to buy a new charger and at some point a new laptop. I had this for less than two years. I'm really disappointed with this.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No problems with it. My college bound engineering student was thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: EyeDocinAZ

customer_reviews.title: Only 8 GB RAM - Not 12
customer_reviews.text: Nice laptop but it says in several places that it has 12 GB RAM while it only comes with 8.
customer_reviews.author: Curious in Kansas

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop for work or personal use.
customer_reviews.text: So far absolutely no issues, works great, fast, and I like the keyboard backlight. I am a realtor so on it continuously, battery life holds well. Set up was a breeze, very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: KG Shops

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 16 year old son for school. Cannot praise this laptop enough
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy, saved few hundreds and my son loves it. Highly recommend this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Laptop for student. Its really friendly for student like us.
customer_reviews.author: Raju Bhusal

customer_reviews.title: Succesful Windows / Linux Dual Boot
customer_reviews.text: Received this ~4 weeks ago. I added a new partition to the SSD and installed Arch Linux on that partition. I'm able to boot into either OS without trouble. The touchscreen is responsive but not impressive. The construction seems good.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Ozdemir

customer_reviews.title: Loud fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in fall 2018. By January 2019 the fan was extremely loud. Contacted Dell and sent the computer in to have the fan replaced. After my origial laptop was lost in shipping, I was sent a replacement. One year later the fan is back to making the same exact noise as before (and now past the warranty). I would recommend a different laptop.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent computer
customer_reviews.text: Nice computer. easy to start up and load my programs. Love the touch screen feature. I add more memory so the computer runs super fast. Ordered on Sunday and had it delivered to my house by Wednesday. Easy to get up running especially for someone who is technically challenged.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Gough

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife and she loves it. The computer talks to you and does what you want it to do. Need to train it to walk the dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Nice performance!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my office work. I am satisfied with the performance but feels it should be better if it had more memory space.
customer_reviews.author: Sailend

customer_reviews.title: So far I love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it!! Can hook my wireless mouse up or use the pad or touch screen! Don’t really care for the bulky charging cord but other than that haven’t found anything... adjusting using windows 10
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Within 6 months of buying it, the keyboard started giving me trouble. Some of the keys just stopped working. At this point, the entire keyboard has stopped working. I feel like I wasted $800. You are better off not buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Arshna

customer_reviews.title: Performance is top notch
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It just rocks in performance. It kills anything you throw at it. Intel quad core cpu's are performing really well.
customer_reviews.author: RAHUL JAYANTH DIDDI

customer_reviews.title: Material is not good
customer_reviews.text: This dell 2 in one is different then the old designs. Material is Plastic. Old design material was metal made.
customer_reviews.author: brk

customer_reviews.title: Good Laptop - Bad battery
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best laptops I've owned in every regard except for the battery life. My old laptop (an Acer) lasted days while this laptop lasts for hours. Also I'm still getting used to not having the number pad on the side, but that's a non-issue
customer_reviews.author: Dugoatboy

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: So far I have only used it as a laptop. Hope it is as good as a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen DErrico

customer_reviews.title: CPU frequency increase?
customer_reviews.text: Everything run normally except the fan noise a little bigger than my expectation. Can I adjust the CPU Frequency from 1.8G to a higher frequency?
customer_reviews.author: FranklinZang

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Laptop. Worth the money and effort!
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop! I imported it all the way to south africa, and I couldn't be happier. The seller even included the dell active pen :D
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: best computer i have ever bought personally
customer_reviews.text: best computer i have ever bought personally. fast, been using on and off for two days on same battery. came with pen, idk who i bought from but if it says windows ten home you wont have office on it. still a good buy. i recommend thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop, quick, quiet, excellent graphics and sound. After many Lenovos a real step up in quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty, works awfully
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty, works awfully. Most problems are with keyboard and touchscreen. If I lived in the US, I would undoubtedly send it back to the seller. Bad choice, I`m really disappointed with this purchase. Atfer all the updates had been installed, virtual keyboad stopped functioning too. Now it is impossible to enable it absolutely. It`s my first and the last dell product. Many "thanks" to both dell and this seller for the troubles I haven`t expected. In comparison with Lenovo Yoga 910 I bought a month earlier, this item is rather f piece of shit than a nootebook.
customer_reviews.author: sergio

customer_reviews.title: ... from a very minor drop and continued to get worse so no touch screen
customer_reviews.text: Had planned to go back to HP since my first Dell Inspiron didn't last 2 weeks before the screen cracked from a very minor drop and continued to get worse so no touch screen. However, I just could not find an HP that had all the features I wanted and could afford: Touch Screen, Backlit keyboard, 360 2-in-1, CoreI7, black keyboard with gray trim - I love it!
customer_reviews.author: SRBprops

customer_reviews.title: and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I have not had this computer very long and have not had time to really take it through it's paces thoroughly. But that being said, it definitely does the things I need from a small laptop, and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Stiteler

customer_reviews.title: Issue with this laptop
customer_reviews.text: Be careful. I bought this laptop 10 months ago and have emailed the seller twice and still not response. The laptop is dead and will not boot up. I have learned my lesson the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: tracey bureau

customer_reviews.title: Heat issues.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I dislike about this product is the computer bottom gets very hot in the middle when used.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Solid State Dive not this one
customer_reviews.text: The hard drive was moved around and computer completely useless now. Before was a great computer. Get a solid state drive not this exact computer
customer_reviews.author: cassie

customer_reviews.title: super fast
customer_reviews.text: This Laptop i'm using for 9 months it's super fast!!!! very portable as well!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Star Sellers Group

customer_reviews.title: and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This computer is fast, slim, and easy to use. It fits my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Veedell

customer_reviews.title: the Amazon part was great. the computer died during a software update and ...
customer_reviews.text: the Amazon part was great. the computer died during a software update and had to send it to the Dell for repair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Slow, battery lasted maybe 3 hours. Very dim screen. When you check internal settings. It’s running 2.0 ghz
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware!! Bought one in Aug 2018 and the Hard drive has already gone bad.
customer_reviews.author: Diane S

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY FRON THIS SELLER
customer_reviews.text: Laptop did not work. Was a gift for my wife so cant return it since when she oppend had pasa the 30 day return. Old text files on the computer, so it must be refurbished!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jose M. Anderez Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Overheats
customer_reviews.text: Like another user mentioned, my laptop had bad issues with overheating - like it burned my legs if I had it on my lap. I returned it and ordered another, assuming I had received a bad egg, and while it still gets hot (especially when using in tablet mode due to where the air vents are located) it's tolerable. It's key to just be aware of where the vents are while using it and not sitting with it in tablet mode for too long.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Dead pixel on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Dead pixel on arrival. I'm surprised this wasn't detected in the factory. Returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: Franco V.

customer_reviews.title: Ordered it for my sister and she had it set ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for my sister and she had it set up with no complication at all... maybe I should get one for myself????
customer_reviews.author: Name Not Displayed

customer_reviews.title: Nice laptop
customer_reviews.text: The machine arrived as scheduled and was correct in the box, but the laptop was not without it's problems. Upon setup the fans were loud and the machine became very hot. The active pen that came with it worked the night of setup but not the next day. After 1.5 hours on chat with Dell support they were able to install different drivers and troubleshoot the fan and the heat. Now it runs quite and cool. They could not fix the pen and promptly shipped a new one for exchange. I'm very happy with it so far and would recommend it. Just be prepared to contact support.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Bouman

customer_reviews.title: Comes with the pen but it's not that good. I have had it for a month now
customer_reviews.text: No complaints so far. Comes with the pen but it's not that good. I have had it for a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Fareed Chishty

customer_reviews.title: I was not expecting the Pen.
customer_reviews.text: The most speedy delivery ever. I was not expecting pen, thanks to the vender. I appreciate. I was using Dell xps before. I almost fell in live with this one in 2 days. Really worth in this budget.
customer_reviews.author: Zulfiqar Ali

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The laptop was super fast but the SSD crashed after dropping it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed with the poor quality of the package
customer_reviews.text: First, I was disappointed with the poor quality of the package. It was not safe enough to protect a laptop. Then, I am returning it in a day after I received a laptop because the speaker has a problem with making noise when it plays. I may pick a wrong egg, but it's very disappointing anyway.
customer_reviews.author: RealGrace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best part is this laptop came with a 4k display but battery does not last very long
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good delivery speed. But the quality is no good. There’s no display after setup. Only HDMI workable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hardware problem
customer_reviews.text: The touchpad didn't work, I had to return the laptop to Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Ydelso B.

product_meta.title: Dell Touchscreen 2-in-1 Inspiron 5000 Backlit Keyboard 13.3 inch Full HD Laptop PC, Intel Core i7-8550U Quad-Core, 8GB DDR4, 256GB SSD, WIFI, Media Card Reader, Windows 10
product_meta.description: Capacity:i7-8550U | 13.3"Picture the possibilities.13-inch 2-in-1 in a sleek and portable design with stunning sound and the latest Intel processors. Optional features like a backlit keyboard and infrared camera for facial recognition.Multiple modes. Ideal options.Flip into action: With an innovative 360-degree hinge, the versatile and lightweight Inspiron 5000 series 2-in-1 allows you to switch easily between four different modes. Tent mode is perfect for using recipes in real time, stand mode for movies on the airplane, laptop mode for typing your novel or emailing work, and tablet mode makes reading while you're reclined easier than ever.Stylish in Every Situation.Ready for the Road: The 13.3" is our most popular 2-in-1 size. It's easy to slip into your bag and provides ample screen room to use for hours without eye fatigue.Maximize Screen Space: The 5000 Series' new design emphasizes more screen and less bezel, so your attention's drawn to that brilliant wide-angle display.Designed to Impress: The dark gray exterior finish is matched with a smooth, matte black inside, offering an attractive, professional appearance that looks great for any occasion.Built for Adaptability. Tested for Dependability.Stunning Sound and Vision: Each Inspiron 5000 comes with Waves MaxxAudio Pro audio and available Intel HD Graphics 520 installed, so your media looks and sounds better than ever.Get Connected: The Inspiron 5000 Series 2-in-1 is equipped with 802.11ac WiFi for fast, long-range wireless connectio...
feature_bullets: 13.3 in Full HD IPS TrueLife LED-backlit touchscreen (1920 x 1080), 10-finger multi-touch support, Intel UHD Graphics 620 with shared graphics memory
Intel Core i7-8550U Quad-Core processor, can up to 4 GHz, 8GB DDR4 2400 MHz, 256GB SSD
2 x USB 3.1 (1 with PowerCharge), 1 x USB 2.0, 1 x HDMI, 1 x Headphone output/Microphone input combo, LAN (10/100/1000)
802.11ac, Bluetooth 4.1, Webcam, Backlit keyboard, 3-in-1 media card reader (SD/SDHC/SDXC), Waves MaxxAudio Pro
Windows 10 Home, 0.77" Thin, 3.72lbs Weight, Battery: 3-cell lithium-ion, Color: Gray

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars144 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
